alert.note: Alert for McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 25 at 6:41PM EDT until April 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF MCINTOSH COUNTY... At 641 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Townsend, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Darien, Wolf Island, Eulonia, Valona, Meridian, Townsend, Crescent, Carnigan, Shellman Bluff, Pine Harbor, Blackbeard Island, Sapelo Island, and Ridgeville. This warning includes I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 50 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
